amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-751 to strike the sentencing commission provision.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
